entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:11 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C

Observed at: Cobourg 06:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
